title: Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Antihero Protagonist   Beast Companions   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Character Growth   Curses   Demi-Humans   Dense Protagonist   Discrimination   Distrustful Protagonist   Dragons   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Goddesses   Hated Protagonist   Heroes   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdoms   Legends   Level System   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Matriarchy   Misunderstandings   Money Grubber   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Naive Protagonist   Pets   Polygamy   Revenge   Royalty   Seven Deadly Sins   Seven Virtues   Shield User   Skill Assimilation   S*ave Harem   S*aves   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: ANEKO Yusagi
description:
Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.

As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!>
